1827da4c-37ca-4e7f-bf54-62e7fe4fae98.description: The earner of this badge is a student who has completed the SAC Student Online Orientation workshop, learning the skills to prepare and succeed in online coursework and competencies, along with experience in Canvas LMS use.
1827da4c-37ca-4e7f-bf54-62e7fe4fae98.name: SAC Student Online Orientation

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC Student Online Orientation workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 80% or higher.

ae6f9657-9eb4-42c3-9ee5-5465716b0d24.description: The earner of this badge is a student who has completed the Finding Articles online workshop, learned what periodicals are, why they are important, how to search articles using the library database and how to use the articles in research. The earner can identify and define types of periodicals, identify their research need, plan and organized their search method, utilize the library database to find articles and search tips and tricks.
ae6f9657-9eb4-42c3-9ee5-5465716b0d24.name: Nealley Library Finding Articles Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Finding Articles online workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 80% or higher.

29548125-64ca-4c3f-8378-cf74b43636b2.description: The earner of this badge has completed the SAC Accessibility Training Workshop, has learned why accessibility is important and required at Santa Ana College and how to create accessible content using various tools in Microsoft Office, Adobe Acrobat, Canvas, SharePoint, and create accessible web pages and media.
29548125-64ca-4c3f-8378-cf74b43636b2.name: SAC Accessibility Training Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC Accessibility Training Workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 100%.

b28390fb-c9c2-4878-a3d6-9e9ed1e5ba42.description: The earner of this badge is a faculty member who has complete the Silver Level Canvas Training and has learned mid-level tasks in the Canvas LMS to include creating content and assessments, managing communications, and grading.
b28390fb-c9c2-4878-a3d6-9e9ed1e5ba42.name: SAC Canvas Silver Training Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Silver Level Canvas Training
Achieve a passing grade of 80% or higher.

c54f2a46-4e8c-40af-82ff-336d39833f1d.description: The earner of his badge is a faculty member who has completed the Bronze level Canvas training and has learned the technical skills required to execute basic tasks in this LMS, including navigating the various pages and managing their features.
c54f2a46-4e8c-40af-82ff-336d39833f1d.name: SAC Canvas Bronze Training Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Bronze Level Canvas Training

bf413448-7cd4-4dba-a010-a523fac2004c.description: The earner of this badge is a student who has learned the technical skills required to execute basic tasks in the Canvas Learning Management System (LMS) including navigation of content, participating in course activities, and viewing grades and feedback.
bf413448-7cd4-4dba-a010-a523fac2004c.name: SAC Canvas Novice Training Badge for Students

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC Canvas Advanced Training.
Pass all course assessments at 80% or better.

dfa9aae0-0ef8-4a82-8379-5a5b6d47a7a7.description: The earner of this badge is a student who has learned the technical skills required to execute advanced tasks in the Canvas Learning Management System (LMS) including completing assessments, groupwork, and using advanced communication tools.
dfa9aae0-0ef8-4a82-8379-5a5b6d47a7a7.name: SAC Canvas Advanced Training Badge for Students

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC Canvas Advanced Training.
Pass all course assessments at 80% or better.

abd2576c-4610-4c36-8203-00c2bba2a1ec.description: The earner of this badge is a faculty member who has learned and can utilize the full functionality of the Canvas LMS. Competencies include creating accessible content, providing regular effective communication, construction of effective modules using the recommended structure. Demonstrated skills include creation of accessible content, use of advanced technical tools, and application of pedagogy in a minimum of two modules.
abd2576c-4610-4c36-8203-00c2bba2a1ec.name: SAC Canvas Silver Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Create and submit a minimum of 2 Canvas modules of a course using the recommended structure.
Achieve a score of at least 35 out of 45 points with no zero (0) ratings.

af891a88-deec-4659-86ca-2a50f03e7540.description: The earner of his badge has completed the SAC Video Creation Workshop and has learned the basics of creating accessible video content.
af891a88-deec-4659-86ca-2a50f03e7540.name: SAC Video Creation Training Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the  SAC Video Creation Workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 100%.

10734439-8cf7-4dc5-ad0c-bfc20fdf5335.description: The earner of this badge is a student who has completed the Is it Legit? Navigating the Misinformation Landscape workshop, has learned to recognize the impact of the infodemic on their information diet; describe the psychological, physiological, and sociological effects of algorithmic bias and digital polarization; and analyze, evaluate and interpret sources of information online.
10734439-8cf7-4dc5-ad0c-bfc20fdf5335.name: Is it Legit? Navigating the Misinformation Landscape

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Is it Legit? Navigating the Misinformation Landscape workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 80% or higher

020efefa-57cd-455e-97d1-3fb863da7ab2.description: The earner of this badge has completed the SAC Virtual Conferencing Workshop, including reviewing virtual conferencing best practices, accessibility, and the technical skills necessary to activate virtual conferencing tools, schedule, and facilitate a virtual conference in a Canvas course.
020efefa-57cd-455e-97d1-3fb863da7ab2.name: SAC Virtual Conferencing Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC Virtual Conferencing Workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 100%

c5df1598-8489-44e2-80b8-11747e939dbb.description: The earner of this badge is a student who has completed the Nealley Library Evaluating Online Information workshop, has learned the basics of navigating and thinking critically about information found on the Web, as well as how to safely and effectively search for information on the Web.
c5df1598-8489-44e2-80b8-11747e939dbb.name: Nealley Library Evaluating Online Information Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Evaluating Online Information workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 80% or higher.

7f43bae8-402b-4e8c-bfc5-65aa2ad88917.description: The earner of this badge is a student who has completed the Nealley Library Strategies for Online Searching workshop, has learned the basics of navigating and thinking critically about information found on the Web, as well as how to safely and effectively search for information on the Web.
7f43bae8-402b-4e8c-bfc5-65aa2ad88917.name: Nealley Library Strategies for Online Searching

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Nealley Library Strategies for Online Searching workshop
Achieve a passing grade of 80% or higher.

c1bcd512-4fac-4059-80a4-f015357cd1cd.description: The earner of this badge is a faculty member who has demostrated the required Canvas skills in a course, providing mastery of the technical skills necessary to create and facilitate a course using the Canvas LMS. Compentencies include creating Canvas pages in modules. Demonstrated skills include creating pages, uploading accessible files and documents while using the recommended structure.
c1bcd512-4fac-4059-80a4-f015357cd1cd.name: SAC Canvas Bronze Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Create and submit a minimum of 2 Canvas modules of a course using the recommended structure.
Achieve a score of at least 16 out of 20 points with no zero (0) ratings.

eb51b15d-2575-439d-8956-e3ecfeb6d06c.description: The earner of this badge is a faculty member who has completed the Gold Level Canvas Training and learned how to executive advance technical skills in the Canvas LMS, including using virtual chat and classrooms, use of groups, peer review, external tools, rubrics, surveys and advanced tools.
eb51b15d-2575-439d-8956-e3ecfeb6d06c.name: SAC Canvas Gold Training Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Gold Level Canvas Training
Achieve a passing grade of 80% or higher.

73528e31-cb48-48a6-915a-d608cf44cb19.description: The earner of this badge has completed the requirements to be Remote Instruction Certified, including completion of the SAC Faculty Canvas Silver Training Badge, SAC Virtual Conferencing Workshop, SAC Accessibility Workshop, and SAC Canvas Silver Certification; and has demonstrated the best practices and necessary technical skills to create accessible content, Title V providing regular effective contact, FERPA compliance, and effective remote instruction in a course using Canvas.
73528e31-cb48-48a6-915a-d608cf44cb19.name: SAC Remote Instruction Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC Remote Instruction Certification Course
Achieve a passing grade of 100%

ab3b6f15-b8f0-4b9f-8349-06468fabef7f.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the technical ability and accessibility knowledge required to create fully accessible Word and PDF documents, and Canvas content pages.
ab3b6f15-b8f0-4b9f-8349-06468fabef7f.name: SAC Demonstrated Accessibility

badge_template_activities.title: Create a Word and PDF document, and Canvas content page demonstrating the technical skill and accessibility knowledge required to create fully accessible content
Achieve a score of 100%

9b07be45-2f6e-4080-ada2-d002eee0427c.description: The earner of this badge is a faculty or staff member who has completed the SLO Training and has learned how to define and create effective SLOs, and analyze associated data.
9b07be45-2f6e-4080-ada2-d002eee0427c.name: SAC SLO Training Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SLO Training

d98aa4e1-3cba-4d6f-87e4-c175aba6f454.description: The earner of this badge is a afaculty or staff member who has completed the Equity, Pathways, OER/ZTC Training and has learned the fundamental connections between Equity, Open Educational Resources (OER), Guided Pathways, and Zero Textbook Cost (ZTC) programs, including the impact, efficacy, pedagogy, and success of the programs.
d98aa4e1-3cba-4d6f-87e4-c175aba6f454.name: SAC Student Equity: Guided Pathway, OER, and ZTC (self-paced course)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Student Equity: Guided Pathway, OER, and ZTC workshop quizzes with a score of 90% or better.

6447758a-f89a-4811-9a81-841ab767babd.description: The Equity Minded Teaching and Learning Institute is a year-long hybrid course focused on supporting faculty as they engage on an interactive curriculum redesign of a course of their choice. The institute is an equity-minded community of praxis that uses a cohort model that includes collaborative assignments/activities, deep reflection, and evaluations.
6447758a-f89a-4811-9a81-841ab767babd.name: Equity-Minded Teaching & Learning Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Faculty are required to complete 70% of a combination of assignments, discussions, reflections, group work, and presentations that focus on creating a transformative syllabus (liquid syllabus), an equity-minded evaluation and revision focus on assignments, lesson planning, grading, assessment, and the Course Outline of Record (COR).

56a1d26c-d58d-431a-b636-d3019f8b3138.description: The earner of this badge is a faculty member who has completed the SAC Online Teaching Certification course and demonstrated its required technical competencies and applied pedagogy.
56a1d26c-d58d-431a-b636-d3019f8b3138.name: SAC Online Teaching Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC Online Teaching Certification Course which is 2.5 Continuing Education Units OR 120 hours of Professional Development Flex Hours.

73cddacd-ec5c-4942-8bbf-27a8659ffb0b.description: Earners of this badge has completed the SAC CVC-OEI Introduction to Live Online Teaching Workshop, including demonstrating the ability to use Zoom to schedule, conduct, and record engaging sessions, the ability to design sessions that support community college students through active learning, use recordings of sessions in compliance with student privacy, accessibility, and interaction requirements and legal recommendations, and develop course materials that foster inclusion for all students.
73cddacd-ec5c-4942-8bbf-27a8659ffb0b.name: SAC CVC-OEI Introduction to Live Online Teaching & Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SAC CVC-OEI Introduction to Live Online Teaching & Learning Workshop
Achieve a passing score of 80% on Quiz 1, 100% on Quiz 2 and 3.
